strings.Value: "LOOK OUT! GOBLINS!"
[Attack them]
[Leave unnoticed]
"It was a trap? For whom?"
"Why would your shaman want to catch humans?"
"Have you caught anyone yet?""
"So where is this shaman of yours?"
"Get out of here, now! I see you again, you'll get what you deserve!"
[Attack] "Catching humans, are you? I'll put an end to this."
[Leave] "Happy hunting — if anyone's fool enough to get caught in your trap, they deserve what happens."
[Attack] "And here I thought I might not get to hear some goblin death screams today."
"What's inside the purse?"
{n}Rubbing their bruises, the goblins pick themselves up and try to brush the dirt off — but their hands are so filthy, they cake on more with every swipe.{/n}
{n}Snarling, grimacing, and shaking their fists, the goblins approach.{/n}
{n}One of them stabs his finger at you.{/n} "Not fair! You caught in our trap! You surrender now!"

{n}A group of goblins is skulking in the bushes. One holds the end of a rope… the other end is tied to a coin purse lying on the road. The goblins are giggling to themselves and poking each other with their elbows.{/n}
{n}The goblins are so intent on watching the road, they don't notice your approach.{/n}

{n}As you approach, a twig snaps beneath your feet — and the goblins spot you. They screech, drop the rope, and scramble for their weapons. One of them points his finger at you and then at the road.{/n} "You stand wrong! Trap be over there, you go there!"

{n}Caught by surprise, the goblins scatter — but in the wrong directions. One of them accidentally jabs another with his dagger, while a third goblin stumbles into a snare under the rope. Finally, they pull themselves together and glare at you. One of them pokes his finger at you.{/n} "Not fair! Not fair! Trap be over there, why you sneak over here?!"
"For passers-by and other by-passers! They pass by back and forth, for no reason at all. Shaman says — catch one or two, he find use for them!"
"Me not telling you! It be a secret!" {n}The goblin scratches his head, then whispers to the others.{/n} "Any you know why shaman wanting humans? He won't say? Damn!"
{n}Turning back to you, the goblin raises his finger.{/n} "A secret! A very big secret!"{n} After that, as if unsure of what to do with is finger, he awkwardly scratches behind his ear.{/n}
"No way we did! We could, but you came and spoiled it all. Now shaman be tearing our ears off… along with our heads!"
"He be not far, in our fort by the river." {n}The goblin points, presumably toward the fort.{/n}
"Nuh-uh, won't be telling you!"
{n}The goblins scream and run in all directions.{/n}
"Stones! SMALL stones. You be expecting gold, huh? Ha, fooled you!"
